# selectedOffer

**Instance Property**

The offer selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var selectedOffer: INRestaurantOffer? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the user selects a special offer when making the reservation, use this property to store the selected offer. You can retrieve the selected offer from the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBookRestaurantReservationIntent/selectedOffer] property of the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBookRestaurantReservationIntent] object when providing your response to that intent.

## Accessing Special Offers

- **advisementText**: A user-readable string containing policies and information related to the reservation.
